circumstances:
While approaching the Indonesian province of Timor, on a flight from Kupang, the twin engine aircraft was shot down by the pilot of a Japanese fighter and crashed into the sea some 24 km off shore. No trace of the aircraft nor the crew was found. 
Crew (2nd Squadron):
F/Lt J. L. Anderson,
Sgt J. G. Wright,
Sgt D. G. J. Horsburgh,
Sgt J. R. Maddern.
probable_cause: Shot down by a Japanese fighter.
